name: Clamp 64
description:
My entry for #LOWREZJAM 2017. Hope you'll enjoy it!

Inspired by 80s classic games, in Clamp64 you move the ship to cut the platforms and capture at lease 70% of the surface, avoid the enemies and collect coins to beat your best score.

Also available for Android on Google Play Store.

Keyboard Controls

  • Arrow keys: Move the ship
  • Space/Enter: Start the game
  • Esc: Exit the game

Credits

  • Music: Drozerix
  • Sounds: Juhani Junkala
